workers.about: Reliable plumber and electrician for home repairs, installations and maintenance.

reviews.author: Akash
reviews.text: Fast, clean work and very polite.

reviews.author: Sumit
reviews.text: Fixed our leakage in one visit.

workers.about: Helps with daily home cleaning and vegetarian cooking on a regular basis.

reviews.author: Sara
reviews.text: Home is always spotless and tidy.

reviews.author: Neha
reviews.text: Bhindi ki sabji bekar banati hai, baaki sab theek hai.
